Package geometries

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
geometries.Geometry
geometries.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Intersectable
public class Plane
extends Geometry
Plane class represents a plan in 3D Cartesian coordinate system by point and normal

    • findIntersections

      public java.util.List<Intersectable.GeoPoint> findIntersections​(Ray ray, double max)
      Description copied from interface: Intersectable
      The functions looks for intersection points between a basic or a composite geometry and a given ray. the function returns null if there are no intersections
      Parameters:
      ray - that intersect the plane
      max - the maximum range from the source of the ray to the point
      Returns:
      a list of intersect points
